name: Forbidden Love
description: "You can't do that, big brother! If you do that sort of thing... we won't just be siblings any more!" Come and try playing this love romance manga like sims game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.8 GHz Pentium 4 Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Resolution:1280*720
